entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Marieville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 1.
